attributes.action: make it fair for pagans to build places of worship with govenment backing.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Non-british religions are given govenment permission and funds in order to build places of worship whilst original pagan temples are now places of worship for christians e.g. temple church, st pauls cathedral.

Paganism is the ORIGINAL faith of this country and tho its funderment message is of peace and harmony it is not properly recognised as a faith, there is no teaching of it in religious education lessions in schools, our customs and sabbats have very little recognition, our life rites e.g.handfastings/marriages are not legally binding and we have no formal places of worship.

I would like the govenment to take note and look into changes toward their support of our faith. we would like them to help us with support and funding as we would like to have the right to worship the way others in the country can.
